topics.body: Also mad respect to Chris Pratt. My biggest fear going into JW was that Owen was just gonna be a copy of Peter Quill, but he was a different character altogether. Whereas Star-Lord was a bit of a dork and a loner, Owen was more confident, charismatic, and subtle. I appreciate the difference.

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557d38ad63687263db001869#post_557d38ad63687263db001869
Basically it's a sort of tournament they're doing in Splatoon. You pick a side and play some Turf Wars. They already had one in Japan and the theme was Bread vs Rice. The US theme is Cats vs Dogs. And the UK theme is Pop vs Rock.
